subject: Ghost Box 12-469  volume question

At what volume should I set the radio at, so I can hear a response from a spirit?
   
  Right now, I can not hear any responses, and have to wait until playback.
   
  If i set it too loud will that loudness drown out a response I may get?
   
  Thanks in advance for your thoughts!
   
  Mike Edwards Cary NC
